duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting in gathering, calculating, and compiling data for use in bid proposal estimates.
Researching historical data and compiling summary reports for future estimates.
Participating in developing project update and bid package estimate documents.
Maintaining files of working documents for back-up to estimating figures.
Assisting in the monitoring of conceptual estimates with actual cost data.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or related engineering field preferred; equivalent technical training and/or related experience in lieu of degree.
